creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: long, narrow, stringed musical instrument; four indentations cut out of sides; black lacquer with small round mother-of-pear inlays along one edge; orange tassels with light blue cord
medium: Wood with black lacquer, mother-of-pearl inlay, and string
title: Zither (kin, 琴) named “Flowing Water” (Ryūsui, 流水)
